meanings.definition: The movement of a liquid through a porous material under the influence of an electric field.
meanings.sent1: Electroosmoses helps liquids flow through special materials.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study electroosmoses to understand liquid movement.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat observed the electroosmoses in the experiment with great interest.
meanings.sent4: The electric field acted like a magnet, pulling the liquid through the material in an electroosmoses dance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun experiment to demonstrate electroosmoses to the students.

meanings.definition: To cause a liquid to move through a porous material under the influence of an electric field.
meanings.sent1: Researchers can electroosmoses liquids for various purposes.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful not to electroosmoses the solution too quickly.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally electroosmoses the sauce all over the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: The electrician skillfully electroosmoses the liquid through the material like magic.
meanings.sent5: She had to electroosmoses the water slowly to avoid any spills.
